page.title: 11HEAD VERGER,DURHAM CATHEDRAL
page.content: This job is very rewarding,you must love and care for the people and enjoy your work.Since Mr.Rees came ten years ago he has seen many changes to the Cathedral.The Dean before{Dean Baelz} opened up the Cathedral for tourists, this increased the vergers job.Now the vergers keep a{diary.}As they plan six months ahead it would throw the Cathedral into chaos if it was lost. Mr.Rees worked at Ely for three years and Wells for six years but he says that he enjoys his work best at Durham.He lives in the College,the close adjoining the Cathedral so that he can be called day or night. There are fifty extra services each year.The unique one is{The Miners' {Gala}which has been held for{ {eighty-three years.}Mr.Rees is always deeply moved by this service.
